solution_line_template: Robbie gets {morning_cups_rice} x {grams_fat_per_cup} = <<{morning_cups_rice}*{grams_fat_per_cup}={morning_fat}>>{morning_fat} grams of fat every morning.
He gets {grams_fat_per_cup} x {afternoon_cups_rice} = <<{grams_fat_per_cup}*{afternoon_cups_rice}={afternoon_fat}>>{afternoon_fat} grams of fat every afternoon.
And he gets {evening_cups_rice} x {grams_fat_per_cup} = <<{evening_cups_rice}*{grams_fat_per_cup}={evening_fat}>>{evening_fat} grams of fat every evening.
So, the total grams of fat he gets every day is {evening_fat} + {morning_fat} + {afternoon_fat} = <<{evening_fat}+{morning_fat}+{afternoon_fat}={daily_fat_total}>>{daily_fat_total}.
Therefore, the total grams of fat he gets every week is {daily_fat_total} x {days_in_week} = <<{daily_fat_total}*{days_in_week}={weekly_fat_total}>>{weekly_fat_total}.
